attributes.action: grant the soldiers serving in Afghanistan & Iraq the Freedom of the City (their hometown) on their return from service.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: The soldiers, sailors & airmen who serve and give their lives for us in Afghanistan and Iraq should be recognised and given the Freedom of the Ciy (or town they come from) upon return from the two said countries. Treat them as heroes, not 2nd class citizens.
